column4: dude what component (pam?) show stats of the computer after login (shell)?
see the manpage for motd.tail for how that message is created.
uhm nothing point me to stats, i guess there is a pam lib like pam_lastlog.
something wrote in motd file before  calling pam_lastlog.
I seem to have modified that file on my install here because I didnt want to see that information, so I cant check to see what it was doing before. :/
